title: Canonical build rules (strict)
gaps: No evidence in AS-IS/SNIPPETS of an executed `as_is_scan.md` run, or of populated `requirements_status.md`, or updates to `implemented_not_documented.md` performed by an agentic AI.
No concrete routes/db/tests/ci evidence provided in AS-IS/SNIPPETS to satisfy the strict evidence linkage rule described in the requirement.
notes: Only a canonical requirements document path is evidenced in AS-IS. No supporting artifact files or evidence links were provided in the batch.

title: Definition of Done (DoD) (strict by default)
gaps: No evidence in AS-IS/SNIPPETS of end-to-end paths (UI→API→DB→side effects) being mapped per capability.
No evidence of automated tests or CI workflows satisfying the DoD levels (Designed/Implemented/Tested/Shippable/Launch-ready).
notes: AS-IS lists some UI pages, but provides no route/db/test/ci evidence to validate DoD for any capability.

title: Required build artifacts (must be produced by agentic AI)
gaps: No evidence that required artifacts exist: `as_is_scan.md`, `requirements_status.md`, `progress_report.md`, `implemented_not_documented.md` (no file:path evidence provided).
No evidence gates satisfied (no route/db/test/ci artifacts cited in AS-IS/SNIPPETS).
notes: Cannot mark implemented without explicit file/path evidence of the required artifacts.

title: Production readiness gates (GO / NO-GO) (hard gates)
gaps: No evidence of a deterministic gate evaluator script (e.g., `scripts/go-no-go-gates.js`) (no file:path).
No evidence of CI producing/reading `out/k6.json`, `out/chaos.json`, `out/dlq.json`, or emitting `out/go-no-go.md` (no ci:workflow / file:path).
No evidence of hard-gate assertions (double assignment, invalid queue state transitions, recovery time, DLQ replay projection) being evaluated.
notes: No CI/workflow or scripts evidence provided in AS-IS/SNIPPETS.

title: Safe deployment automation (canary + rollback) (mandatory)
gaps: No evidence of canary rollout automation 25%→50%→100% (no ci:workflow or deployment config files).
No evidence of automatic rollback tied to GO/NO-GO gates (no ci:workflow).
No evidence of release tagging, runtime config snapshotting, or storing GO/NO-GO report as CI artifact (no ci:workflow).
notes: No deployment automation evidence provided in AS-IS/SNIPPETS.
